title: News | Children's Minnesota
description: Children's latest stories in the news and press releases,
cleaned_text: [ Children's Minnesota launches Shine Bright for Kids fundraiser to support children fighting cancer and blood disorders ](/2023/09/01/childrens-minnesota-launches-shine-bright-kids-fundraiser-support-children-fighting-cancer-blood-disorders/) Donations make a difference in the lives of patients and families who receive care from the largest pediatric cancer and blood disorders program in the Upper Midwest.
